ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly begin to grow out and backward, becoming long and furred, starting just behind [npc.her] eyes. Heh ears go whoosh #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] playfully [npc.verb(touch)] [npc.her] new skirren ears. Mmm soft.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldJackalSquirral(skirren ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription]. Lieutenant fluffy ears reporting for dudy, heh dudy.
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of noticeable, #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF skirren ears, which are positioned just behind [npc.her] eyes and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
